content.label: i like to tap them

title.label: First time i willingly wanted to review a game!

content.label: Simply Addicting and whimsical.
I have no idea what’s happening or why but I love it
This game is weird and wonderful, it clearly was made with a lot of depth and strategy to it. The story cards are my favorite part, I have to keep unlocking more!
Puzzle games can be daunting.  This game is too, but god it is just so immediately fun that learning it is just exciting, weird, and wonderful.

Always loved oddball Japanese games growing up, here’s a good puzzle title from a reliable developer.

Do wish they’d put the revised version of Dandy Dubgeon on iOS though. Game works better on mobile I think.

title.label: L O V E  A N D  P E A C E

content.label: First it’s esoteric; then it’s frantic; then it’s strategic; then it demands you figure out every contour of the scoring system before you can finally drag some hope back into the world. Bleakly funny yet strangely moving, and winner of the Pulitzer Prize for best orgy scene on the App Store - pick them onions!!
I love the charter designs and the music. Really a swell fun little game. I wonder how deep it will get ??

title.label: Very addictive puzzle game made by some talented onions!

content.label: If you love fun characters and tapping, man this game is for you!
No idea what is going on or what I am doing! But it is fun?
It was a struggle for me to first adapt to such a game. Novice in, noob out.

Started as chaos. Now I’m finding strategies in enemy behavior that have gotten me to what I believe is the Final Boss. Fun. Simple but deep gameplay. Beautiful in its quirkiness. My current go-to game on
my iPhone.
I love this game.  5 Stars!

It has a quirky story, fantastic music, humorous humor and addictive candy crush type of gameplay. What more do you want! 

P.S NO MICROTRANSACTIONS!
To put it simply this game is many things. It's addicting, it's quirky, the graphics are strange but wonderful, the gameplay is frantic but with depth, and the style/tone is very original.

title.label: Insane game made by a madman

content.label: I have no idea what’s going on but i love it

This is the kind of creative, fun game that makes me happy to actually purchase something on the App Store.

The idea is quirky, fun and super interesting, the game play is fun. Overall awesome game
Weird. But I like how the cards give lore.

title.label: What the heck did I just play?

content.label: Frantic tapping combined with a semi-coherent story and an unnerving fixation on onions. It’s like a WarioWare minigame that lasts forever. It’s a perfectly serviceable game, but is too simple and repetitive to be much fun, and seems to mistake randomness for hilarity.

Embark on an epic journey with your onion pals. The crazy storyline is one you’ll definitely see in your dreams and maybe even your nightmares. Drama, romance, sex, violence, this game has it all! Really great designs and non-stop action. 

My life would be complete with an Onion Plush!
If you like fun, addicting gameplay with a sit-for-a-session attitude, or strange but charming stories, then you’ll like this!
So much wackiness and no extra paid content or ads. Really enjoyable to play!
Million Onion Hotel is clearly a passion project. It’s full of fun and surprises, and while it starts out easy, it has surprising depth.

title.label: You can't find a game exactly like this

content.label: What's to say?  It's got the most completing sorry ever.  Just play.
Goooood
Play it!
Needs to be updated for iPhone X screen size

Best boy. Good game. 10 outta ten. One problem, though. Would suggest to no one. Onions is my life now. Never saw it going this way. I️ had a promising career, a dog also. Now there is none of that.

Only onion.

Why am I tapping onions? Why did I witness this old man and younger woman begin to make love while soldiers sneak up on them? Is there a way you’re supposed to play this game other than spamming all over the screen?

No idea.

But this game isn’t plagued by ads and in-app purchases, so it’s better than 90% of the App Store.
This game is really fun! Worth every penny. I love that you just pay and get the full game, no nonsense.
Wild and deep and worth your time.
The core matching gameplay is a frantic combination of reflexes and strategy. There is a quirky story and many funky bosses to fight. There’s a surprising amount of depth here too. Give it a whirl!
ONION TIME
This game is a gem. It’s creative and strange and as unique as it geta
Can’t explain why but it’s really good. Reminds me of the wario ware games with the sounds.

title.label: I hate it and I want my money back.

content.label: I was hoping for more strategy and less clicker style gaming.  Make a trial version.

title.label: Wonderful game that always plays better after doing dishes

content.label: one clue for success in the game, stay away from the red onions and the anchovies. I take a nap before I play it seems to help. Clue two, think things out, don't be so quick to make a move. My friend and I enjoyed pop corn yesterday. It helped with the headaches and hemroids  we get when we play this game. Beautiful soundtrack to the game, but the app could use a little soul music in the background. The only flaw I can see in the game is the lack of brown onions and kale. Aside from those two flaws one terrific game that you will want to play over,and over and over again. I'm going to sweep the floor a get back to playing.   One last thing.  The real fun comes when you beat the game.  I could tell you how but I don't want to ruin the gaming EXPERENCE for you. One clue , focus on the upper right hand part of the screen. Good luck gamers.

title.label: Can’t listen to anything but soundtrack

content.label: As far as I can tell, there’s no way to listen to anything but the game soundtrack while playing this. Even if I hit the play button on my headphones, it’ll pause the music immediately. This is a really frustrating issue that makes me not want to play the game at all until it’s fixed, and I’m really not happy that I just spent $4 on this game.
This game just brings weirdness and fun to a whole new level. It’s a quirky little game that will keep you addicted to days on end. Just try the game out for yourself. You will not be disappointed.
Really fun, challenging, silly and adorable 🖤 love the tiny onion, please keep him safe!!!
hum hum...onion make good game...hum hum!
Crazy crazy crazy!  Just hit away, try to figure out what's going on, I think I'm understanding the scoring and I keep on unlocking new stuff.  Lots of fun !
I’m not sure i understand this game, but i’m still having tremendous fun!
fun and a little weird, just what i go in for :)
